responses
200
networkGetRoutesResponse
type object
properties
paginationPageInfo
type object
properties
totalCount
type string
description The total number of items in the dataset
hasPreviousPage
type boolean
format boolean
description Whether or not a previous page of data exists
hasNextPage
type boolean
format boolean
description Whether or not another page of data is available
startCursor
type string
description The cursor for the first item in the set of data returned
endCursor
type string
description The cursor for the last item in the set of data returned
description Information about a paginated response

This is modeled after the GraphQL Relay spec to support both cursor based pagination and traditional offset based pagination
results
type array
networkRoute
type object
properties
id
type string
readOnly True
description A routes unique identifier
name
type string
description A routes humanreadable name
slug
type string
description A routes machinereadable name
stackId
type string
readOnly True
description The ID of the stack that a route belongs to
networkId
type string
readOnly True
description The ID or slug of the VPC network that a route belongs to
networkMetadata
type object
properties
networkStringMapEntry
type string
description A string to string key/value pair
createdAt
type string
format datetime
readOnly True
description The date that a metadata entry was created
nullable True
updatedAt
type string
format datetime
readOnly True
description The date that a metadata entry was last updated
nullable True
deleteRequestedAt
type string
format datetime
readOnly True
description The date that an entity was requested for deletion
nullable True
version
type string
description An entitys version number

Versions start at 1 when they are created and increment by 1 every time they are updated
description Metadata associated with an entity
statuses
type array
networkRouteStatus
type object
properties
region
type string
description The region in which a routes status resides

Regions take the form  where pop is a StackPath EdgeCompute POP and cluster is a networking cluster within that POP
readOnly True
RouteStatusState
type string
default ROUTESTATUSUNSPECIFIED
description ROUTESTATUSUNSPECIFIED Route in this region is in an undefined state
  RUNNING Route has 1 or more assigned gateways and is correctly configured in this region
  NOGATEWAY Route does not have any assigned gateways but is configured in this region
  DELETING Route is being deleted from the region
gatewayIps
type string
readOnly True
description A list of route gateway IPs in the region
readOnly True
description The status of a route in different regions
destinationPrefixes
type string
description A routes destination network prefix in CIDR format
gatewaySelectors
type array
RouteGatewaySelector
type object
interfaceSelectors
type array
networkMatchExpression
type object
properties
key
type string
description The name of the selector to perform a match against

Provide the key workloadplatformstackpathnet/workloadslug to select EdgeCompute workloads by their slug All network interfaces in the workload are used as the routes gateway
operator
type string
description The operation to perform to match a selector

Valid values are in with support for more possible in the future
values
type string
description The values to match in the selector
description An expression to match selectors against a set of values
description List of match expressions that must all match a single interface
description Selectors that determine which EdgeCompute workload network interfaces should be be used as the routes gateway

Selectors are applied to the route in order with the highest priority assigned to the first gateway
description A response to retrieve any routes on a given network
